segments.text: Near the boy, I see a young girl standing on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's facing him and the open cabinet, clearly part of the cookie mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her arms is raised towards the jar, palm open, in a clear gesture of anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not touching the stool, but her posture shows she's completely invested.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's waiting patiently for her share, an expectant look on her face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention is solely on those cookies, just like the boy's.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's cute how they're collaborating on this little secret operation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm surprised the woman hasn't heard them yet, given their proximity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so eager, it's quite charming to see.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they both get their treats without any accidents.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her excitement is palpable from here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a team these two make.
segments.speaker: PAR
